item.title: Narborough Probate Material, 1661-1680
item.description:
Puritan Matthew Clark, rector of Narborough 1658-60, was preaching in 14 different parishes across the county in 1669, and was imprisoned three times in Leicester gaol for his beliefs.

The following inventories have been transcribed for this parish:

John Alein, whittawer, 1670

William Pidgeon, 1677

John Smith, 1675

William Wright, baker, 1679
item.dc:creator: PamF
